Articles.Content:
I wonder what impact in the game this traits would have.

Kerbal Ribbas Kerman have more courage than Jeb, and no "stupidity"
It affects when the Kerbals get scared/excited on the astronaut square things.
I wonder if this will affect the career mode
I just wish someone would come out and tell us how they affect things
We need another thread on this? Look here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42096-Courage-Stupidity-Affect-anything
